items.title: Rentify
items.team: Me, Elias Helander and Raghul Mohan
items.description: Rent stuff you don't need to buy! Final project of the </SALT> training.

items.title: Activity Tracker
items.description: Track your workouts with this app! My React + REST app as a "hackday" project during the </SALT> training.

items.title: React TO-DO-app
items.description: A React app that lets you create and edit your todo-list, and even stores it in the browser for you until next time. Weekend project during the </SALT> training.

items.title: JavaScript TO-DO-app
items.description: A vanilla JavaScript app that lets you create and edit your todo-list, and even stores it in the browser for you until next time. Weekend project during the </SALT> training.

items.title: Avfallskollen
items.description: Avfallskollen is a smart recycling guide for municipal companies. It helps the municipalities with the information och us with how to recycle. Recycling made easy!

items.title: Swing Hopping
items.description: Swing Hopping is a website used by 5.000 swing and blues dancers (lindy hop, blues, balboa, shag, jazz, tap) monthly under normal circumstances. Here you find the bigger dance events and festivals all around the world.
